name: Cusco, Sacred Valley Overnight Ollantaytambo, Inca Trail Hike & Aguas Calientes
description: This exciting tour combines a guided tour of  Cusco and the Sacred Valley with the Inca Trail Trek. In this all encompassing tour, you will see the best that the Cusco region has to offer. In this tour, you will stay for one night in the historic town of Ollantaytambo, nestled in the Sacred Valley.
